titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 225 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York, as the "Hugh L. Carey United States Courthouse".
To designate the United States courthouse located at 225 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York, as the "Hugh L. Carey United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 225 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York, as the Hugh L. Carey United States Courthouse.
